title: Minocycline-associated lupus erythematosus.
summary: We report a patient who developed symptoms of lupus erythematosus which was apparently related to minocycline therapy for acne vulgaris. To our knowledge, this is only the second reported case of minocycline-associated lupus erythematosus....
abstract: We report a patient who developed symptoms of lupus erythematosus which was apparently related to minocycline therapy for acne vulgaris. To our knowledge, this is only the second reported case of minocycline-associated lupus erythematosus.
